code:
%% Core assessment processing flow
flowchart TD
  A[Start Assessment\nUser answers items] --> B[collectAnswers]
  B --> C[computeRawScores]
  C --> D[convertAllToTScores]
  D --> E[determineRisk]
  E --> F[buildResult]
  F --> G[Persist to localStorage]
  F --> H[Display Modal]
  G --> I[Calendar View]
  G --> J[Analysis Charts]
  subgraph DevMode[Dev Mode Panel]
    C -.-> DM1[Raw Scores]
    D -.-> DM2[T-score Mapping]
    E -.-> DM3[Risk Logic]
  end
  style DevMode fill:#fafafa,stroke:#bbb,stroke-dasharray: 5 5
